name: Starter Template
description: A modern starter template for AI, Web3, or SaaS apps using Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, and Shadcn UI.

src/.app/: Next.js App Router routes, layouts, and server actions

components/.ui/: Shadcn UI components (generated via CLI) and shared UI primitives
components/.layout/: Navigation, sidebar, header, and shell components

src/.lib/: Utilities, API clients, database setup, and app-wide configuration
src/.hooks/: Custom React hooks for client-side logic
src/.styles/: Tailwind base, globals, and overrides (e.g., globals.css, tailwind.css)

components.ui: Use `npx shadcn-ui add <component>` to generate Shadcn primitives into components/ui; extend with MagicUI when needed.
components.shared: Cross-feature UI belongs in components/ui or components/layout, avoid duplicating.

guidelines.hooks: Prefix with `use-` and place inside src/hooks for reusable client logic.
guidelines.types: Keep global TS types in src/types; generate supabase.ts from Supabase schema.
guidelines.lib: Place utilities, API wrappers, database clients, and config here. Server-only code should be isolated.
guidelines.app: Colocate feature-specific components, actions, and hooks within their route folder under src/app/.
